alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:16PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wasatch and west central Duchesne Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Tabiona, or 27 miles east of Heber City, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tabiona and Hanna. This includes Utah Route 35 between mile markers 27 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
